earthquake.name: Water
earthquake.description: 1 gallon per person per day for at least 3 days

earthquake.name: Food
earthquake.description: Non-perishable, easy-to-prepare foods that do not require cooking

earthquake.name: First-aid kit
earthquake.description: A basic first-aid kit with bandages, antibiotic ointment, pain relievers, and other basic medications

earthquake.name: Radio
earthquake.description: A battery-powered or hand-crank radio with NOAA weather radio capabilities

earthquake.name: Multi-tool
earthquake.description: A multi-tool with a variety of tools, such as a knife, pliers, and screwdriver

earthquake.name: Sanitation supplies
earthquake.description: Toilet paper, hand sanitizer, and wet wipes

earthquake.name: Copies of important documents
earthquake.description: Copies of your identification, insurance policies, and medical records

earthquake.name: Cash
earthquake.description: Some cash in small bills, in case you cannot use credit cards or ATMs
